entry.title: How to unhighlight text in GoodReader
entry.content:
It was not easy to figure out how to unhilghight text in GoodReader.

After trying every item of context menu on selected text, long touch and swipe on Annotations list, I consulted the Google. I found a Question but that didn’t help me a lot.

It turned out that I just needed a single touch on the highlighted text. GoodReader finally showed me the context menu below.

That’s it. It jsut did what’s expected.
